channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- REX640 PCL1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- REX640 PCL1

item.title: CVE-2022-1596|2024-08-03T00:10:03.785Z -- abb -- rex640%20pcl1
item.description: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource vulnerability in ABB REX640 PCL1, REX640 PCL2, REX640 PCL3 allows an authenticated attacker to launch an attack against the user database file and try to take control of an affected system node.
